doc:
William Talman (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Talman_(actor) 0 William Whitney Talman, Jr. (February 4, 1915 – August 30, 1968) was an American television and movie actor, best known for playing Los Angeles District Attorney Hamilton Burger in the television series Perry Mason. William_Whitney_Talman , Jr. ( February_4_,_1915 – August_30 , 1968 ) was an_American_television_and_movie_actor , best_known for playing Los_Angeles_District_Attorney_Hamilton_Burger in the_television_series_Perry_Mason .
